messages.subject: CNN doing story on unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: CNN is looking for some families to interview for a story on unschooling. They are on a tight schedule and would like to interview some people by phone today
messages.messageBody:
CNN is looking for some families to interview for a story on unschooling.

They are on a tight schedule and would like to interview some people by
phone today and tomorrow (Friday 13 and Saturday 14, 2006). They may want to
follow up with some families to video their activities. They are especially
interested in getting some families from the Chicago and Atlanta areas.

They would like to get a mix of some families with younger children and
those with older children (or families with both) as well as both boys and
girls.

If you would be willing to talk to the reporter, please contact me directly
at this e-mail address and I will provide you with contact information.

Billy Greer
funlists@...
Family Unschoolers Network - www.Unschooling.org
FUN Books www.FUN-Books.com


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
